Player History
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $3,100,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Walt Terrell (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/17/1985, off Mike Flanagan (NYG)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/1986, hitting .464 with 1 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/18/1987 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 8/13/1987...
Drove in 6 runs against Toronto on 5/22/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/1988, hitting .593 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...

Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
